YouTuber Joe, 31, and professional dancer Dianne, 33, met on Strictly Come Dancing in 2018,… [+2857 chars]

articles.author: Katie Palmer
articles.title: Line of Duty special episodes: All we know so far about show's 'surprise return' - Express
articles.description: Line of Duty fans were thrilled to hear the popular police drama could be returning in 2023 with some special episodes.
